verses.verse: <S%G2065><s%> Now We Beseech <S%G1161><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> By <S%G5228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Gathering Together <S%G1997><s%> ' To <S%G1909><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Quickly <S%G5030><s%> To Be Shaken <S%G4531><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mind, <S%G3563><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> To Be Troubled, <S%G2360><s%> Neither <S%G3383><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> Nor <S%G3383><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Epistle, <S%G1992><s%> As If <S%G5613><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Is Present <S%G1764><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Should Deceive <S%G1818><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> Any <S%G3367><s%> Way, <S%G5158><s%> Because It Will Not Be <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> Shall Have Come <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostasy <S%G646><s%> First, <S%G4412><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Have Been Revealed <S%G601><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Of Sin, <S%G266><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Perdition, <S%G684><s%>

He Who <S%G3588><s%> Opposes <S%G480><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Exalts Himself <S%G5229><s%> Above <S%G1909><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Object Of Veneration : <S%G4574><s%> <S%G5620><s%> So As For Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> To Sit Down, <S%G2523><s%> Setting Forth <S%G584><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> Do Ye Not Remember <S%G3421><s%> That, <S%G3754><s%> Yet <S%G2089><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Said <S%G3004><s%> To You? <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Restrains <S%G2722><s%> Ye Know, <S%G1492><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be Revealed <S%G601><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G1438><s%> Time. <S%G2540><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Is Working <S%G1754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Lawlessness; <S%G458><s%> Only There Is <S%G3440><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Restrains <S%G2722><s%> At Present <S%G737><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> He Be Gone, <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> Will Be Revealed <S%G601><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lawless One, <S%G459><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Will Consume <S%G355><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Breath <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Of His Mouth, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Annul <S%G2673><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Appearing <S%G2015><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3952><s%> Of His Coming; <S%G846><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> ' According To The <S%G2596><s%> Working <S%G1753><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Satan <S%G4567><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Signs <S%G4592><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonders <S%G5059><s%> Of Falsehood, <S%G5579><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Deceit <S%G539><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them That <S%G3588><s%> Perish, <S%G622><s%> <S%G473><s%> Because <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Received Not <S%G1209><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be Saved <S%G4982><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Will Send <S%G3992><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> A Working <S%G1753><s%> Of Error, <S%G4106><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Believe <S%G4100><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> What Is <S%G3588><s%> False, <S%G5579><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> May Be Judged <S%G2919><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Believed Not <S%G4100><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth, <S%G225><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Delighted <S%G2106><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Unrighteousness. <S%G93><s%>

<S%G2249><s%> But We <S%G1161><s%> Ought <S%G3784><s%> To Give Thanks <S%G2168><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God <S%G2316><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> Brethern <S%G80><s%> Beloved <S%G25><s%> By The <S%G5259><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Chose <S%G138><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Sanctification <S%G38><s%> Of The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Belief <S%G4102><s%> Of The Truth; <S%G225><s%>

<S%G1519><s%> Whereto <S%G3739><s%> He Called <S%G2564><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2098><s%> Our Glad Tidings, <S%G2257><s%> To The <S%G1519><s%> Obtaining <S%G4047><s%> Of The Glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Lord <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> Then, <S%G3767><s%> Brethern, <S%G80><s%> Stand Firm, <S%G4739><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hold Fast <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Traditions <S%G3862><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Were Taught, <S%G1321><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G1992><s%> Our Epistle. <S%G2257><s%>

<S%G846><s%> But Himself <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave Us <S%G1325><s%> Encouragement <S%G3874><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%>

May He Encourage <S%G3870><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hearts, <S%G2588><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May He Establish <S%G4741><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Good. <S%G18><s%>
